title: A French nun survived the Spanish flu and both world wars. Now she's beaten COVID-19 days before she turns 117.
content:
1. A French nun survived the Spanish flu and both world wars. Now she's beaten COVID-19 days before she turns 117.  Anchorage Daily News
  2. World's second-oldest person survives COVID-19 at age 116  WTVR CBS 6
  3. Sister Andre, 117-Year-Old French Nun, Knocks Down Covid-19  The New York Times
  4. Europe's oldest person, a 116-year-old French nun, survives Covid-19  CNN
  5. 117-year-old nun who beat COVID to mark birthday with champagne, red wine and Mass  WWLP.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
A French nun survived the Spanish flu and both world wars. Now she's beaten COVID-19 days before she turns 117.  Anchorage Daily News

localize.title: 一位法国修女在西班牙流感和两次世界大战中幸存下来。现在她在117岁前的19天战胜了COVID。
一位法國修女在西班牙流感和兩次世界大戰中倖存下來。現在她在117歲前的19天戰勝了COVID。
